forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 52. West northwest wind around 8 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 63 in the afternoon. West northwest wind 3 to 14 mph.

weather_report:
In the tranquil hours just past midnight, Downtown San Francisco reveals a landscape kissed by the cool breath of the Bay. The stars, arching high above, twinkle with a seafaring confidence, while a gentle stirring of wind from the west whispers through the streets. With the low temperature settling around 52, the night promises a crispness that invigorates both the body and soul. As dawn approaches, expect the city to awaken beneath a cobalt sky, bathed in the warmth of a late autumn sun, reaching a pleasant high near 66. The coastal winds will playfully dance between 3 to 14 mph, coaxing a crisp clarity to the day.

There’s an assured brightness to Tuesday—a welcome change from the foggy veils that often shroud this coastal haven. The Golden Gate Bridge will stand proudly against the horizon, a beacon open to exploration. Dress in layers to embrace the transition from the morning’s cool embrace to the afternoon’s inviting warmth. Perhaps a light sweater and comfortable shoes will serve you well as you wander the picturesque streets. A stroll through the always-inviting Golden Gate Park awaits, or a serene visit to one of the charming cafes dotting the landscape would be delightful. As the city comes alive, consider lingering at a local bookstore or an art gallery. Embrace the day, for it invites a symphony of simple pleasures in the unfolding autumn light.
